section.name: iteration
section.title: Current iteration
section.p: This is immediate stuff only for this iteration (1.1beta).

dl.dt: PHP 5.0.5 to PHP 5.3 compatible under E_STRICT.
All deprecated methods need to be removed.
Methods, etc starting with an underscore need private/protected.
Look at adding a file() loading command.
dl.dd: Can be found in the patches section.

dl.dt: The HELP_MY_TESTS_DONT_WORK_ANYMORE needs to be updated.
Docblocks need to be cut back to the minimum.

internal.link: Items for Unit tester, Reporter, Mock objects, Parser, Browser, Web tester, Documentation and Build.
